@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+def nhap():
+    A=[]
+    while True:
+        a=input()
+        if a=='': break
+        else:
+            A.append(a)
+    return A
+A=nhap()
+for i in range(len(A)):
+    A[i]=A[i].replace('Python','J',len(A[i]))
+    A[i]=A[i].replace('Java','P',len(A[i]))
+    for j in A[i]:
+        if j=='P':A[i]=A[i].replace('P','Python',len(A[i]))
+        if j=='J':A[i]=A[i].replace('J','Java',len(A[i]))
+            
+for k in A:
+    print(k)
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
A=[]
while True:
    a=input()
    if a=='': break
    else:
        A.append(a)
print(A)
